title: its so indefinite
review:
This is a long long boring journey towards, well honestly i dont know, and i couldnt find the meaning of this expressionistic piece of movie art, with dull actors, dull story, bad camerawork and so on.and an essence that are so obscured that you may start to think are they stupid or is it just me....

the grumpy old man gives 1, not recommended

title: Amazing storyline and cast
review: Where to start? The movie starts off already grasping my interest with asking the W's. It leads in to different characters going through their own difficult situations yet somehow they all connect. This film has a little bit of everything between family, friends, death, romance, etc and left me with puffy eyes from ugly crying. An absolute must watch!!!

title: Beautiful
review: Beautiful, thought provoking, full of glorious twists and turns...wonderful deep and grounded performances. Lovely.
